newsitem.title: USA: Speciality Care to buy doctors' practice.
newsitem.headline: Speciality Care to buy doctors' practice.

text.p: Specialty Care Network Inc said it has a definitive agreement to acquire substantially all of the assets and certain liabilities of The Orthopaedic and Sports Medicine Center, a nine-physician practice group located in Annapolis, Md.
In connection with the acquisition, the company will enter into a long-term service agreement with the practice group.

Consideration for the acquisition will consist of about $4.1 million in cash and the issuance of about 412,000 shares of common stock by the company. The deal is expected to close in the next 30 days, subject to the satisfaction of certain conditions.
